com.mansoor.uncommon.configuration
Class Configuration

java.lang.Object
  com.mansoor.uncommon.configuration.Configuration
Direct Known Subclasses:
BaseConfiguration
public abstract class Configuration
extends Object

The main configuration interface.

This interface contain various type safe methods to manipulate underlying configuration.

Property retrieval methods such as get,getList and getNestedMethods return null if property is not found. Unrecoverable errors are converted to unchecked exceptions and thrown to the caller.

It is recommended that instead of implementing this interface directly, BaseConfiguration class should be overriden as it already provides an implementation for most methods.

Since:
0.1
Author:
Muhammad Ashraf
